I have completed the BVS course with specialism enroute to LLM and received my Call to Bar from Lincoln’s Inn on 24th November 2022. I would describe myself as a leader, meticulous and diligent. I am equally effective as a team member as an individual at work. I have an excellent command over English language. I am articulate and clear in my arguments, presenting them with precision and clarity. In my peer’s opinion, I am intelligent and capable individual. I possess superior analytical ability and problem-solving skills. I would add that I am full of vitality and determination and apply myself fully to the task at hand. Currently, I am practicing law in Civil Courts of Lahore.
